title: How did the Tang and Song dynasties influence the modern world? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let’s start with the Tang Dynasty, the tang dynasty was the golden age of China, during this time, nations like Japan and Korea, decided to adopt most of the traditions and customs and architecture of the Chinese to make their nation more powerful, after a disastrous war with Tang China. Their dress became more alike to the Chinese. Even today, China’s influence can be seen amongst Japanese and Koreans. Paper money was invented, which spread to the west, eventually, replacing heavy gold and silver coins.During the song dynasty, new inventions were created, the blast furnace, which allowed people to melt metal. Military inventions were also invented, like cannons, and landmines. Mass material producing inventions were also invented, influencing the industry of around the world even during modernity.
